verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Holiness unto Jesus
Holiness unto You, Lord
Holiness unto Jesus
Holiness unto You, Lord

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Holiness unto the Lord
Unto the King
Holiness unto Your name
I will sing

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love You
I love Your ways
I love Your name
I love You and all my days
I'll proclaim
